title: Unable to connect to authentication server
body: It works from another network if i log in but i cant connect from my router. Other things as youtube, other games and stuff like this work but only League of legends won t work

replies.body: Sounds like some of those router settings might not be set up in the best way to get connected to *our* servers specifically. Let's adjust your Port Forwarding and DNS settings really quickly which you can find those steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
